message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper is about applying neural network language models to the task of calculating semantic similarity for Russian. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also discusses the use of corpora and the training of models, which could fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Additionally, the use of neural networks for semantic modeling could be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
